mapper.select: SELECT nnum ,mnum ,id ,nudate ,mealtype ,LISTAGG(fname, ' „Üç ') WITHIN GROUP(order by fname) AS fname ,fimage ,SUM(fweight) AS fweight ,SUM(calories) AS calories ,SUM(carbohydrate) AS carbohydrate ,SUM(protein) AS protein ,SUM(fat) AS fat ,SUM(sugar) AS sugar ,SUM(sodium) AS sodium FROM ( SELECT n.nnum ,n.mnum ,id ,nudate ,mealtype ,fimage ,fname ,fweight ,calories ,carbohydrate ,protein, fat ,sugar ,sodium FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM NUTRITION ) NATURAL JOIN MEAL ) n INNER JOIN FOOD f ON n.nnum = f.nnum AND n.mnum = f.mnum ) GROUP BY mealtype ,fimage ,nnum ,mnum ,id ,nudate HAVING id = #{id} AND nudate = #{selectDate}
